description: Learn more about my background, expertise, and what drives my passion for mobile development.

items.title: Background
items.description: Graduating in Information Technology in 2023, I have 2+ years of experience developing Flutter applications. Having worked with projects from startups to enterprises, I clearly understand how to build scalable and maintainable apps.

items.title: Expertise
items.description: Flutter developer with experience building production apps across AI applications, third-party SDK integrations, healthcare, and social platforms, from feature implementation to store release.
